hero.title: Let's learn about new knowledge and abilities!
hero.desc: Visit our training center and improve your English as much as possible. Believe us, it will definitely benefit you. English With Begov will help you with this!

about.title: About us
about.desc: Here you can get information about our facilities and get to know our learning center more closely.
about.cardDesc1: You can not only learn from us, but also enjoy and work in our training center.
about.cardDesc2: Our learning center also has an official certificate issued by the government, you can trust us.
about.cardDesc3: Our learning center takes an individual approach to each student and helps them solve their problems.
about.cardDesc4: A student studying at our educational center learns to work in a team and think creatively, along with learning English.

teachers.title: Our teachers
teachers.desc: Here you can get information about our teachers and get to know our learning center more closely.
teachers.teacherDesc: Hi, I'm Begov Dostonbek. I am 24 years old. I teach English grammar and pre-ielts subjects at Top Language Center. To date, I have taught grammar and pre-ielts to more than 300 students and brought them to the IELTS level.
teachers.name: Begov Dostonbek

contact.title: Get information about courses and enroll in courses
contact.desc: Enter your phone number and get information about courses!
